thread.title: Hosts Ivory Coast leave Zaha out of African Cup of Nations squad - ESPN
thread.title_full: Hosts Ivory Coast leave Zaha out of African Cup of Nations squad - ESPN

author: Reuters
title: Hosts Ivory Coast leave Zaha out of African Cup of Nations squad - ESPN
text: [Ivory Coast](/football/team/_/id/4789)'s [Galatasaray](/football/team/_/id/432) winger [Wilfried Zaha](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/146324/Wilfried-Zaha) has not been called up by coach Jean-Louis Gasset in the country's 27-man African Cup of Nations squad which was named on Thursday. The 31-year-old, who moved to the [Turkish Super Lig](/football/league/_/name/tur.1) from [Crystal Palace](/football/team/_/id/384) in the close season, has only played in two friendlies for Ivory Coast this year, missing their Cup of Nations qualifiers and last month's first round of World Cup qualifying. Gasset has included [Nottingham Forest](/football/team/_/id/393)'s [Serge Aurier](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/143576/Sèrge-Aurier), [Ibrahim Sangare](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/213718/Ibrahim-Sangaré) and [Willy Boly](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/152349/Willy-Boly) plus [Al-Ahli](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/8346/al-ahli) midfielder [Franck Kessie](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/194711/Franck-Kessié) and [Trapzonspor](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/997/trabzonspor) winger [Nicolas Pepe](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/210397/Nicolas-Pépé), who returns after a year's absence. [Hajduk Split](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/489/hajduk-split)'s [Ismael Diallo](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/194710/ismael-diallo) got a first call-up, while [Union Saint Gilloise](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/5807/union-st-gilloise)'s [Lazare Imani](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/241111/lazare-imani) makes his second squad. Forwards [Sebastien Haller](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/164171/Sébastien-Haller) of [Borussia Dortmund](/football/team/_/id/124) and [RB Salzburg](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/2790/fc-salzburg)'s [Karim Konate](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/326475/Karim-Konaté) also feature for the hosts, who face [Guinea-Bissau](/football/team/_/id/8602/guinea-bissau) in the tournament's Jan. 13 opener. They also play [Nigeria](/football/team/_/id/657) and [Equatorial Guinea](/football/team/_/id/8938) in Group A. Squad: Goalkeepers: [Yahia Fofana](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/261595/yahia-fofana) ( [Angers SCO](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/7868/angers)) [Badra Ali Sangare](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/182030/Badra-Ali-Sangaré) ( [Sekhukhune United](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/20814/sekhukhune-united)) [Charles Folly](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/350774/charles-folly-ayayi) ( [ASEC Mimosas](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/19217/asec-mimosas)) Defenders: Serge Aurier (Nottingham Forest) [Wilfried Singo](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/286569/Wilfried-Singo) ( [AS Monaco](/football/team/_/id/174)) [Obite Ndicka](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/242593/obite-ndicka) ( [AS Roma](/football/team/_/id/104)) [Ousmane Diomande](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/343964/Ousmane-Diomande) ( [Sporting CP](/football/team/_/id/2250)) [Odilon Kossonou](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/284822/odilon-kossounou) ( [Bayer Leverkusen](/football/team/_/id/131)) Willy Boly (Nottingham Forest) [Ghislain Konan](http://www.espn.com/soccer/player/_/id/250888/Ghislain-Konan) ( [Al-Fayha](https://www.espn.com/soccer/club/_/id/21827/al-fayha)) Ismael Diallo (Hajduk Split) Midfielders: [Idrissa
